import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Breadcrumb=()=>{const location=useLocation();// Generate breadcrumb items based on current path

let name=segment.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+segment.slice(1);// Special cases for better naming
if(segment==='logistics'){name='Skygate Logistics';}else if(segment==='travel'){name='Skygate Travel';}else if(segment==='about'){name='About Us';}else if(segment==='contact'){name='Contact';}breadcrumbs.push({name,path:currentPath,isActive:isLast});});return breadcrumbs;};const breadcrumbs=generateBreadcrumbs();// Get current page brand styling
const getCurrentBrand=()=>{const path=location.pathname;if(path.startsWith('/logistics')){return{separatorColor:'text-logistics-400',activeColor:'text-logistics-600',hoverColor:'hover:text-logistics-600',bgColor:'bg-logistics-50/80',borderColor:'border-logistics-200'};}else if(path.startsWith('/travel')){return{separatorColor:'text-travel-400',activeColor:'text-travel-600',hoverColor:'hover:text-travel-600',bgColor:'bg-travel-50/80',borderColor:'border-travel-200'};}else{return{separatorColor:'text-primary-400',activeColor:'text-primary-600',hoverColor:'hover:text-primary-600',bgColor:'bg-primary-50/80',borderColor:'border-primary-200'};}};const brandStyles=getCurrentBrand();// Don't show breadcrumb on homepage
